articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praises Feb. 8 Vinalon Complex Builders
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praises Feb. 8 Vinalon Complex Builders
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Friday sent a letter of special thanks to the workers, technicians and officials of the February 8 Vinalon Complex for having brought about a great auspicious event by successfully building a modern vinalon factory.
					 In his letter Kim Jong Il noted that the February 8 Vinalon Complex is a historic complex associated with the great efforts and undying leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung who dedicated his whole life to the happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 He said:
					
					 In order to glorify the immortal revolutionary feats of the President, pioneer and builder of the Juche-oriented vinalon industry, down through generations, I provided field guidance to the complex and issued an order to build a modern vinalon factory as required by the new century and took revolutionary measures for dynamically pushing ahead with the construction project.
					
					 Our trustworthy workers in the field of vinalon industry actively tapped latent reserves and kicked off waves of a dynamic socialist emulation in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude even under the hard conditions where everything was in short supply, achieving such eye-opening success as building modern production processes of vinalon, agrochemicals and dyestuff. 
					
					 The workers, technicians and officials of the complex put the vinalon production process on a CNC basis and radically changed the appearance of the complex as required by the IT age, true to the idea and intention of the Party to push back the frontiers of science.
					
					 They successfully completed in a matter of two years the project for the modernization of the complex, which would have taken more than a decade at an ordinary pace, and began mass-producing vinalon belt fiber, vinalon cotton, agrochemicals, dyestuff and varieties of other chemical products. This is the result of their manifestation of tremendous mental power and a great auspicious event of the whole country foretelling a rosy future of a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 The start of production at the February 8 Vinalon Complex which has turned into a modern young one made it possible to give fuller play to the might of the Juche-oriented vinalon industry established by the President and realize at last the lifelong wishes of the President who made indefatigable efforts and worked heart and soul to enable our people to benefit from the vinalon production.
					
					 The complex, which is of key importance in the nation's economic development and people's living, has turned into a modern huge chemical centre demonstrating its tremendous capacity. This is an extra-big event as important as launching a new type A-bomb and represents a great victory of socialism.
					
					 The trustworthy workers of the complex, who protected the equipment of the complex, tightening their belts during the "Arduous March", forced march, made the complex go operational again though it had remained at a standstill for 16 years, hitting the back of the heads of the imperialists hell-bent on applying sanctions against the DPRK in a bid to stifle it and demonstrating that no formidable enemy can ever bring the Korean people to their knees.
					
					 Looking again and again at the vinalon cotton, a product of the indomitable mental power of the workers in the field of vinalon industry, I was overwhelmed with the excitement at the thought that I can make a report on another victory to President Kim Il Sung out of joy and our people came to enjoy happiness after spending years of hardships.
					
					 They are the genuine soldiers and disciples of the President and true heroes and patriots born of the era of a revolutionary great surge as they glorified in practice the President's Juche-oriented idea of building a vinalon industry and exploits and made a breakthrough towards improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 The Party and the people will always remember the feats they have performed by providing a bright prospect for improving the people's standard of living and achieving the prosperity of the country by building a modern vinalon factory.
					
					 I note with great satisfaction that the workers, technicians and officials of the complex successfully built a modern vinalon factory in the spirit of thoroughly implementing the Party' instruction, the spirit of flattening even a high mountain if requested by it, thus demonstrating the spirit of socialist Korea advancing towards a thriving nation riding Songun Chollima. I highly appreciated your heroic feats. 
					
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex should operate the newly built modern production processes at full capacity without a moment's standstill to keep the production of such chemical products as intermediary vinalon products, vinalon cotton, agrochemicals and dyestuff going at a high rate and play a very big role in radically developing the nation's light industry and agriculture and bringing about a turning point in improving the people's standard of living. 
					
					 It is my firm belief that they will bring about a fresh boost in the production of chemical products and make a positive contribution to effecting a radical change in improving the people's standard of living and opening the gate to a thriving nation, deeply aware of their heavy mission and tasks they assumed before the Party, the revolution, the country and the people.
					
					 A meeting for conveying the letter was held in Hamhung on the same day. It was conveyed by Kim Yong Nam, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.

articles.title: Hamhung City Mass Rally Held
articles.content:
Hamhung City Mass Rally Held
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A Hamhung City mass rally was held with splendor to celebrate the completion of a modern vinalon factory, a great auspicious event of the whole country.
					 Hamhung City celebrating the completion of the modern vinalon factory was wrapped in a festive mood.
					
					 Hamhung Square and its adjoining streets were crowded with hundreds of thousands of citizens from all walks of life of the city with bunches of flowers in their hands.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il was present at the rally.
					
					 He warmly waved back to the enthusiastically cheering masses and heartily congratulated the Hamhung citizens including the workers of the February 8 Vinalon Complex who performed shining labor feats in building the modern vinalon factory.
					
					 Present there were senior party, state and army officials Kim Yong Nam, Kim Yong Il, Kim Yong Chun, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Choe Yong Rim, Hong Sok Hyong, Kim Ki Nam, Kim Jong Gak and Kim Il Chol, Chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party Kim Yong Dae, vice-premiers of the Cabinet, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK, leading officials of the complex and heroes and labor innovators of Hamhung.
					
					 Present there on invitation were leading officials of the party and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media and leading officials and persons of merit of the province and Hamhung. 
					
					 Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, delivered a report at the rally.
					
					 He said that the great success made in the vinalon industry which made excitement and joy prevail the whole country is the precious fruition of the might of the single-minded unity of Songun Korea where the leader believes in the people and the latter absolutely trusts and follows the former and the inexhaustible mental power of the army and the people of the DPRK filled with the strong spirit of self-respect of the nation, the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude and the spirit of noble love and devotion to the future.
					
					The world-startling event powerfully demonstrated the inexhaustible might of the self-supporting economy of Songun Korea pushing back the frontiers of science, looking at the world and fully showcased the valiant spirit of the heroic Korean working class dynamically advancing toward the high eminence of the victory of a thriving nation, resolutely frustrating the moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK, he noted.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK remains strong, the socialist country stands firm and the DPRK is sure to win a final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation as long as there are the ever-victorious Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the large contingent of the heroic workers including those in the field of the vinalon industry unfailingly loyal to the cause of the Party and the firm foundation of the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 Ri Hi Hon, director of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, and Ri Yong Ae, chairperson of the Management Board of the Tongbong Cooperative Farm in Hamju County, in their congratulatory speeches at the rally called upon the Party members and other working people across the country to advance more valiantly and faster to attain higher goals on all fronts for building an economic power with the same indomitable mental power and work style as displayed by the heroes produced by the field of the vinalon industry, rallied closer around the headquarters of the revolution headed by 
						Kim Jong Il, and thus honorably and proudly enter the square celebrating the October jubilee with a report on a shining victory to the mother Party.

articles.title: Employees of Feb. 8 Vinalon Complex Feted
articles.content:
Employees of Feb. 8 Vinalon Complex Feted
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A banquet, provided by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in honor of workers and technicians of the February 8 Vinalon Complex, took place at Majon Hotel, Sinhungsan Hotel and the Sinhung Restaurant on Saturday.
					 Attending it were senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the Workers' Party of Korea, leading officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions as well as active workers, technicians and officials of the complex.
					
					 Speeches were made at the banquet by President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Kim Yong Nam, Premier Kim Yong Il and Secretary of the WPK Central Committee Choe Thae Bok.
					
					 The speakers referred to the unremitting efforts Kim Jong Il made to turn the complex associated with the lifelong pains of President Kim Il Sung into a modern factory substantially conducive to improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Il gave the credit for the achievements made in the project for putting the complex on a modern basis to its workers, technicians and officials and put them forward at the meridian of glory and happiness, they praised him as the great leader and tender-hearted father who takes warm care of the revolutionary soldiers and trains them to be masters of history carving out and advancing the era, treasures of the country and vanguard fighters in the gigantic drive to build a thriving nation while making them enjoy a worthwhile life and honor to the full.
					
					 They called upon the workers of the complex to bear deep in mind his benevolence and remain faithful to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the WPK and work sustained miracles and feats in the ongoing general offensive for improving the people's standard of living.
					
					They underscored the need to bring about great changes once again in the work to keep the production of the vinalon factory going at a steady rate and expand its capacity, cherishing the idea and intention carried in the joint New Year editorial, the joint calls of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the letter of the workers at the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex, and thus push forward the final charge to open the gate to a thriving nation.

articles.title: Performance Given to Celebrate Completion of Vinalon Factory
articles.content:
Performance Given to Celebrate Completion of Vinalon Factory
Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the artistes of the South Hamgyong Provincial Art Troupe and national art troupes at the Hamhung Grand Theater Saturday to celebrate the completion of a modern vinalon factory which brought about a great auspicious event of the whole country under the wise leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Among the audience were senior party, state and army officials and the chairperson of a friendly party, leading officials of party, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, workers, technicians and officials of the February 8 Vinalon Complex, officials and working people of South Hamgyong Province.
					
					Put on the stage of the performance started with narration and chorus "It Is a Great Auspicious Event of the Country" were such colorful numbers as female solo "We Are Grateful to Generalissimo
						 Kim Il Sung", male solo "Thunder over Jong Il Peak", female quintet "Let's Drink a Toast".
					
					The performers enthusiastically sang of the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung who had tirelessly trodden long and thorny path all his life to dedicate himself to the country and the people and built a thriving socialist nation on this land, regarding it as his lifelong motto to believe in people as in Heaven, and the greatness of Kim Jong Il who is demonstrating the heroic stamina of Songun Korea through his tireless and energetic leadership.

articles.title: Dancing Party Held in Hamhung
articles.content:
Dancing Party Held in Hamhung
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of youth and students in Hamhung was held in Hamhung Square on Saturday in celebration of the completion of a modern vinalon factory.
					 Among the spectators were persons of labor innovators of organs related to the February 8 Vinalon Complex, officials of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 In the dancing party started with song "Glory to General" the participants danced to the tune of such songs as "Lets' Sing of General Dear to People", "His Ideal", "It Is a Great Auspicious Event of the Country", "Let's Drink a Toast" and "Arirang of Prosperity".
					
					They enthusiastically danced to the tune of "Appearing in the East and in the West, It's the Anti-Japanese Guerilla Style" and other songs recollecting with deep emotion the great exploits of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Presented on the ground of the square were large letters reading "CNC" representing the pride of Songun Korea which is making great innovations and leap forward on all the fronts of building a great prosperous and powerful nation. Then followed merry peasant dances spiced with national flavor which added to the festive atmosphere of the dancing party.

articles.title: Meeting of June 15 All-Korean Committee Delegations Here
articles.content:
Meeting of June 15 All-Korean Committee Delegations Here
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration headed by its permanent representative, Kim Sang Gun, and a delegation of the Overseas Side Committee led by Chairman Kwak Tong Ui arrived here on Saturday to participate in a meeting of chairmen of the north, south and overseas sides of All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration (June 15 All-Korean Committee).

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Historical Inevitability of Victory of Justice
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Historical Inevitability of Victory of Justice
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Nothing can bar the popular masses from following the path of independence and justice, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is historical inevitability proven by world record of wars that justice is sure to triumph.
					
					 The victory won by the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War proved that no formidable aggression forces can ever bring the people who turned out as one in the struggle for justice to their knees. This truth was also clearly proven by the results of the Second World War and the Vietnamese War.
					
					 Events that have taken place in the international arena recently also convinced people of the inevitable victory of justice. 
					
					 Last year the imperialists and the international reactionaries have desperately resorted to the hostile moves toward the DPRK only to be strongly rebuked by the army and people of the DPRK. This great victory testified once again to the fact with no vicious moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK can the imperialists and the reactionaries bring the army and people of the DPRK into submission.
					
					 The Korean people's sacred struggle for the just cause is instilling faith and courage into the progressive people of the world.
					
					 Justice, however, will not come true by itself.
					
					 A victory in the struggle for justice is guaranteed by the powerful arms and the revolutionary unity.
					
					 The Korean people will, in the future, too, make positive contributions to victoriously advancing the human cause of independence, the just cause, the article concludes.

articles.title: S. Korean Army Planes Crash One after Another
articles.content:
S. Korean Army Planes Crash One after Another
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A copter belonging to the Aerial Operation Command of the puppet ground force crashed in the air over Namyangju City, Kyonggi Province Wednesday during a madcap war exercise targeted against the DPRK, leaving all its pilots dead, according to MBC and CBS of south Korea.
					 Two F-5s belonging to the 18th combat flying corps of the puppet air force crashed into a mountain near the Taegwan Ridge in south Korean Kangwon Province on Tuesday.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Policy of Jane Crow under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Policy of Jane Crow under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Joint Planning Team for March 8 World Women's Day made up of the Federation of Women Peasants Associations, the Women's Solidarity, the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Solidarity for Progress, the All Together Organization, the Democratic Labor Party and other civic and public organizations and political parties of south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 28 to denounce the policy of discrimination against women pursued by the puppet authorities of south Korea.
					 Noting that unreasonable discrimination against women is going on in south Korea, the statement deplored that hit by an economic crisis, women are dismissed before any others and they are paid lesser wages than men for the same work done by them.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Women are given no benefit even after giving birth to babies and most of the women workers are irregular workers. Women in their 20s are groaning in the mire of joblessness, denied even irregular jobs.
					
					 Women should turn out in the actions to win equal rights with men in order to be free from all sorts of discrimination and humiliation.
					
					 Women should never forget the victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, in particular, as their rights were mercilessly abused by the Japanese imperialists.

articles.title: Heyday in Reunification Movement Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Heyday in Reunification Movement Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a resolution on Feb. 28 in which it called for bringing about a great heyday in the reunification movement.
					 The resolution recalled that 10 years have passed since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration but the nation's desire for independence, peace and reunification has not yet come true.
					
					 Since the emergence of the present regime, in particular, the inter-Korean relations have inched close to the brink of a war though they had favorably developed since the publication of the above-said declaration and the authorities have become evermore undisguised in their sycophancy towards the U.S., the resolution held, adding this was obviously not what the people expected from the June 15 era. 
					
					 In order to get rid of the misfortune they have suffered over the past two years they should judge the present regime and the "Grand National Party" without fail and this objective can be achieved only through a united struggle, the resolution asserted, and continued: 
					
					 The organization will actively develop the movement for driving the U.S. forces out of south Korea and concluding a peace treaty into an all-people movement and bring about a great heyday in the reunification movement with the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, a landmark of reunification, as a momentum.
					
					 It will surely judge the sycophantic, treacherous, undemocratic, anti- reunification and unpopular regime in the election to the local self-governing bodies, it declared.

articles.title: Policies Pursued by S. Korean Authorities in Two Years Flayed
articles.content:
Policies Pursued by S. Korean Authorities in Two Years Flayed
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- Lawmakers from the Democratic Party of south Korea on Feb. 24 in their broadcasting appearances denounced the policies pursued by the puppet authorities in the two years of their office.
					 Contrary to the "promise" made by the authorities to create 600,000 jobs every year, the number of jobless people reached four million and the economy has gone totally bankrupt, they deplored, adding:
					
					 What the authorities brought to the people in the two years of their office is only debts and joblessness and what they spawned is only split and conflict in society evidenced by the railroading of the evil bill on media, the work for pushing ahead with the project for improving "four large rivers" and the controversy over the issue of "Sejong City".
					
					 Their "state administration" is so deplorable that vogue in society are the satirical words "three fools--a man believing in the authorities, the second one following the policies of the regime and the third one trusting the results of the investigation made by the prosecution."
					
					 Referring to the fact that the authorities have insisted on the policy of confrontation "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars", they described the two years of the present regime as "two years of the people's sufferings and tears," "two years of state administration's failure" and "two years of going against trend."

articles.title: British and Czech Associations Flay Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
British and Czech Associations Flay Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Feb. 27 in which they denounced the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces for their war moves.
					 The statement accused the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces of planning to stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises from March 8. These war maneuvers are little different from the Team Spirit joint military exercises as they would be staged under the changed codename and they are aimed to ignite a war, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 Assuming dangerous nature, this saber-rattling is a challenge to the peace not only on the Korean Peninsula but also in Northeast Asia and other parts of the world, the statement noted, adding that it goes to prove that the "dialogue" and "peace" touted by the U.S. Administration are nothing but hypocrisy.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wishes to see the resumption of the six-party talks, it should lift the sanction against the DPRK and cancel the projected exercises, the statement noted, calling upon all the followers of the Juche idea and Songun politics and those who value independence and justice to intensify the movement for solidarity with the DPRK, the homeland of the Juche and a bulwark of socialism.
					
					 The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association released a statement on March 3 vehemently lashing out at the projected war exercises.

articles.title: Mexican Organization Issues Bulletin
articles.content:
Mexican Organization Issues Bulletin
 Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea issued its bulletin titled "The DPRK's mode of building a thriving nation." It carried a photo of General Secretary Kim Jong Il giving field guidance to the Rakwon Machine Complex.
					 The bulletin in an article noted that the DPRK has already attained the status of a politico-ideological power and a military and scientific and technological power, adding that it can be called a thriving socialist nation both in name and reality if it emerges an economic power by channeling all efforts into the economic construction.
					
					 Explaining the way the DPRK works hard to accomplish the cause of building a thriving nation, the article said:
					
					 The DPRK is building the thriving nation by definitely keeping the ideological work ahead of all other work and thereby giving fullest play to the revolutionary zeal and creative ingenuity of the masses.
					
					 It is also building the thriving nation in the spirit of self-reliance which calls for depending upon its own resources and raw materials, efforts and technology under any circumstances.
					
					 It is building the thriving nation by setting an example in a certain region and unit and generalizing it.
					
					 Its leader is providing field guidance, greatly encouraging the popular masses in their drive to build the thriving nation.
					
					 The DPRK is building a great prosperous and powerful nation by the socialist method under any circumstances.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Various Countries
Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar, film show and joint art performance were held in Uganda, Russia and Libya from Feb. 16 to 24 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Speakers at the joint seminar held by the Juche idea study organizations in Uganda highly praised
						 Kim Jong Il as a genius of ideology and theory as he has developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, adding that the DPRK is throwing its rays over the world as an independent, scientific and technological power thanks to the Juche idea and Songun politics.
					
					The general manager of "Vneshtorgprom" Co. Ltd. of Russia, after watching the Korean film "Korea with Long History," said he came to know well about the long history of the Korean nation.
					
					He hoped that the DPRK with a long history to be proud of in the world would shed its more brilliant rays in the international arena.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il expresa agradecimiento especial al complejo de vinalon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il expresa agradecimiento especial al complejo de vinalon
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio el dia 5 un mensaje de agradecimiento especial a los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero quienes trajeron un gran jubilo a todo el pais al edificar excelentemente la moderna fabrica de vinalon.
					 El Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero es la fabrica historica que conserva las huellas de ingentes esfuerzos y las imborrables hazanas de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung quien dedico toda su vida por la felicidad del pueblo, senalo el Dirigente en la misiva y continuo:
					
					 A fin de glorificar de generacion en generacion las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del gran Lider, precursor y fundador de la autoctona industria de vinalon, cuando dirigia en el terreno el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, emiti la orden de acondicionar de manera moderna la fabrica de vinalon conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo y tome las medidas revolucionarias para impulsar con energia esta obra.
					
					 Aunque faltaba lo todo y bajo dificiles condiciones, nuestros fidedignos obreros de vinalon lograron el brillante exito de haber construido nuevamente el moderno proceso de produccion de vinalon y el otro de productos agroquimicos-colorantes explorando y movilizando activamente las reservas internas y librando con afan la emulacion socialista con el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y lucha tenaz.
					
					 Acatando con el corazon la idea y el proposito del partido de conquistar la cumbre tecnologica, los obreros, tecnicos y funcionarios del complejo introdujeron la tecnologia CNC en el proceso de produccion de vinalon conforme a la demanda de la epoca IT y renovaron de manera radical la fisonomia del complejo.
					
					 Quedo terminada con exito en un corto tiempo de dos anos la modernizacion de la fabrica de vinalon que requeria de mas de 10 anos segun pronosticos y se producen en gran cantidad diversos articulos quimicos, entre otros, la fibra de vinalon en cinta, el algodon de vinalon, los productos agroquimicos y la tinta.
					
					Esto deviene la gran explosion del poderio espiritual de los obreros de vinalon y el gran jubilo de todo el pais que anuncia el brillante futuro de la gran potencia prospera.
					
					 Gracias al inicio de la produccion del citado complejo remozado como moderna fabrica, se hizo posible poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la autoctona industria de vinalon fundada por el Presidente y llevar a la realidad por fin el deseo de toda la vida de el quien realizo incansables esfuerzos espirituales y fisicos por dar beneficios de vinalon al pueblo.
					
					 El hecho de que el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, que tiene importancia clave en el desarrollo economico del pais y la vida del pueblo, se convirtio esta vez en la gran y moderna base quimica y se levanto como gigante mostrando su colosal poderio, deviene un evento de categoria especial igual al lanzamiento de nueva bomba atomica y la gran victoria del socialismo. 
					
					Nuestros fidedignos obreros de vinalon, que defendieron los equipos apretando el cinturon en los dias de la "Marcha penosa", la forzada, repusieron en funcionamiento a su fabrica a los 16 anos desde que fue apagada. De esta manera, dieron un duro golpe por la espalda a los imperialistas enfrascados en sancionar y atropellar a la RPDC y demostraron claramente a todo el mundo que ningun enemigo puede doblegar al pueblo coreano.
					
					Mirando y remirando el algodon de vinalon que encarna la indomable fuerza espiritual de los obreros de vinalon, quede muy emocionado de poder dar al Lider padre el parte de otra victoria y alegria y de pensar que nuestro pueblo va a ser dichoso al cabo de duras pruebas.
					
					De veras, los obreros de vinalon, quienes llevaron a la practica la autoctona idea y las hazanas del gran Lider en materia de la construccion de la industria de vinalon y abrieron la brecha en la mejora de la vida del pueblo, son soldados y discipulos verdaderos del Lider, autenticos heroes y patriotas nacidos de la era del gran auge revolucionario.
					
					Nuestro partido y pueblo nunca olvidaran las proezas de los obreros de vinalon que al construir la moderna fabrica de vinalon, dieroh las firmes perspectivas de la mejora de la vida del pueblo y la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					Evaluo altamente las proezas heroicas de los obreros, los tecnicos y los funcionarios del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero poniendome muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan construido magnificamente la moderna fabrica de vinalon empleando el espiritu de materializacion a ultranza, con el cual son capaces de remover los montes incluso si lo demandara el Partido, y manifestado a todo el mundo el temperamento de la Corea socialista que montada a Chollima del Songun, avanza hacia la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					El complejo debe seguir poniendo en pleno funcionamiento las modernas cadenas de produccion nuevamente construidas para normalizar en un alto nivel la produccion de semiproductos de vinalon y su fibra, productos agroquimicos, tinta y otros productos quimicos, de modo que desempene un papel decisivo para el desarrollo vertiginoso de la industria ligera y la agricultura del pais y un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo.
					
					Estoy seguro de que los obreros, los tecnicos y los funcionarios del complejo, bien conscientes de su pesada mision y tarea asumidas ante el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, contribuiran activamente a imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo y a abrir las puertas a la gran potencia prospera mediante un gran auge en la produccion de articulos quimicos.
					
					El mismo dia, tuvo lugar en Hamhung la ceremonia de entrega del mensaje de agradecimiento.
					
					El mensaje fue leido por Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Condecoracion a los benemeritos del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
articles.content:
Condecoracion a los benemeritos del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero
 Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 5 en Hamhung la ceremonia de premiacion a los funcionarios, cientificos, tecnicos y obreros quienes realizaron los meritos en la modernizacion del Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero.
					 Los funcionarios y obreros de este complejo terminaron solo durante los 2 anos la enorme obra de modernizacion al reinstalar generalmente los procesos productivos ya existentes  y aplicar CNC a  los procesos productivos de vinalon.
					
					 Participaron en la ocasion el presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Thae Jong Su, los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos del citado complejo y de las unidades conexas. 
					
					 En la ceremonia, fueron condecorados a 74 personas con el titulo de Heroe del Trabajo de la RPDC junto con la Medalla de Oro "El Martillo y la Hoz" y la Orden Bandera Nacional de primera clase, y a las 7, con el titulo honorifico. 
					
					 Tambien, a las 27 fue conferido el reloj con el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung, y a las 22, el diploma de honor del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					 Ademas, 2 mil 389 personas recibieron las ordenes y medallas.

articles.title: Justicia triunfa, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Justicia triunfa, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- Con nada impide el camino de la justicia de las masas populares que avanzan hacia la independencia.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este sabado y continua:
					
					 Triunfar la justicia es la inevitabilidad de la historia. Lo comprueba la historia de guerra mundial.
					
					 La victoria lograda por el pueblo coreano en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953) confirmo que por muy fuertes que sean las fuerzas agresoras, no pueden doblegar jamas al pueblo levantado unanimemente en la lucha por la justicia. 
					
					Tambien, los resultados de la Segunda Guerra Mundial y la guerra de Vietnam comprobaron evidentemente esta verdad.
					
					 Ademas, pueden conocerlo bien a traves de los eventos ocurridos en la escena internacional en los ultimos anos.
					
					 En el ano pasado, los imperialistas y otros reaccionarios internacionales recurrieron desesperadamente a las maniobras hostiles a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 El ejercito y el pueblo de Corea frustraron despiadadamente esas maquinaciones hostiles.
					
					 Esta gran victoria volvio a demostrar que los imperialistas y los reaccionarios internacionales no pueden arrodillar jamas con ningunas maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que se han levantado audazmente en el cumplimiento de la causa de la justicia.
					
					  La lucha sagrada del pueblo coreano por la citada causa infunde la conviccion y el coraje a los pueblos progresistas del mundo.
					
					  La garantia de la victoria en la lucha por la justicia reside en las poderosas fuerzas armadas y la unidad revolucionaria.
					
					 En el futuro tambien el pueblo coreano contribuira activamente a impulsar triunfalmente la causa de la independencia, la de justicia de la humanidad.

articles.title: Entidad surcoreana aboga por auge del movimiento de reunificacion
articles.content:
Entidad surcoreana aboga por auge del movimiento de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 6 de marzo (ATCC) -- La Solidaridad de Ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta Sur-Norte del Sur de Corea hizo publica el 28 de febrero una resolucion en que expuso su voluntad de procurar la era dorada del movimiento por la reunificacion.
					Todavia no se ha realizado la aspiracion nacional a la independencia, la paz y la reunificacion aunque transcurrieron 10 anos desde la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, senala el documento y continua:
					
					Particularmente, despues de la toma de posesion del actual "poder", las relaciones intercoreanas, que marchaban positivamente, se acercan al borde de guerra, y se tornan mas abiertos los actos serviles a EE.UU. de las autoridades.
					
					Esto no era la era del 15 de Junio deseada por el pueblo.
					
					Para acabar con las desgracias sufridas por nuestro pueblo durante 2 anos pasados, debemos enjuiciar sin falta al actual "poder" y al "Gran Partido Nacional" y esto sera posible solo con la lucha unida.
					
					Nuestra organizacion desplegara dinamicamente como campana de todo el pueblo el movimiento por la retirada del ejercito norteamericano y por la concertacion del acuerdo de paz, y abrira la era dorada del movimiento por la reunificacion con motivo del aniversario 10 de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, hoja de ruta de la reunificacion.
					
					Por ultimo, la nota puntualiza que el actual "poder" vendepatria y servil a las grandes potencias, antidemocratico, anti-reunificacion y anti-popular sera castigado sin falta en las "elecciones de entidades locales autonomas".
